scripts.thirdParty: mkdir -p dist/lib; cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/ dist/lib/bootstrap; cp -r node_modules/jquery/dist/ dist/lib/jquery; cp -r node_modules/react/dist/ dist/lib/react; cp -r node_modules/fullcalendar/dist/ dist/lib/fullcalendar; cp -r ./node_modules/fullcalendar/node_modules/moment/ dist/lib/moment
scripts.copyFiles: cp src/cal.html dist/; cp src/index.html dist/;  cp -r src/styles/ dist/styles; cp -r src/assets/ dist/assets
scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run thirdParty && npm run copyFiles
